author: Nick Romano
title: Olympics 2020 postponed in Tokyo over coronavirus
description: 2020 Olympics to be postponed one year due to coronavirus
content:
The 2020 Olympic Games in Tokyo are being postponed due to the coronavirus pandemic.
In recent weeks, various athletes and athletic organizations in the U.S. and abroad had implored the International Olympic Committee to delay this summer's events, which wer… [+4241 chars]
